org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor

Class NormalizerMinMaxScaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.dataset.api.preprocessor.NormalizerMinMaxScaler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DataSetPreProcessor, DataNormalization

    public class NormalizerMinMaxScaler
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataNormalization
    Created by susaneraly on 5/25/16. A preprocessor that applies min max scaling Can take a range X -> (X - min/(max-min)) * (given_max - given_min) + given_min default given_min,given_max is 0,1
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
